com.safenetinc.jcprov.params

Class CK_PBE_PARAMS

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.safenetinc.jcprov.params.CK_PBE_PARAMS

  • public class CK_PBE_PARAMS
extends java.lang.Object
    Parameter for the
    CKM.PBE_SHA1_DES3_EDE_CBC
    mechanisms.

    Further information is provided in the PKCS#11 standard and the Programmers Manual.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      long iteration
      number of iterations required for generation
      long passwordLen
      length in bytes of the password information
      byte[] pInitVector
      receives the 8 Byte iv, if required
      byte[] pPassword
      password to be used in the PBE key generation
      byte[] pSalt
      salt to be used in the PBE key generation
      long saltLen
      length in bytes of the salt information
